meanings.definition: A small insect that feeds on the roots of grapevines.
meanings.sent1: The phylloxera infestation affected the grapevines' roots.
meanings.sent2: Farmers had to deal with phylloxera damaging their grapevines.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous phylloxera played hide and seek in the grapevines.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny vampires, phylloxera sucked the life out of the grapevines.
meanings.sent5: The grapevines trembled as phylloxera invaded their roots.

meanings.definition: A type of plant louse that can cause damage to grapevines.
meanings.sent1: The phylloxera louse was spotted on the grapevines.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners worked hard to eliminate phylloxera from the vineyard.
meanings.sent3: The phylloxera bugs threw a party on the grapevines.
meanings.sent4: Phylloxera spread through the vineyard like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The grapevines wilted under the attack of phylloxera.

meanings.definition: An insect pest that can destroy grape crops.
meanings.sent1: Farmers dreaded the arrival of phylloxera during harvest season.
meanings.sent2: Phylloxera outbreaks led to significant losses in grape production.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous phylloxera danced around the grape crops.
meanings.sent4: Phylloxera swept through the vineyard, leaving devastation in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The grape crops withered under the relentless attack of phylloxera.
